titles.title: MILC Continuation Act of 2012
A bill to amend the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to extend and improve the milk income loss contract program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: 2/17/2012--Introduced. MILC Continuation Act of 2012 - Amends the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to extend, for one year, the milk income loss contract program.
